settings.heading: OPEN POSITION
settings.subtext: Be part of a team working together to change the face of the mass customization industry. We value a meritocratic decision making and team building process. If you’re smart, hungry, and good at what you do, we want you here.
settings.form-content:
- Operating our Engraving & Printing equipment (don't worry - we'll teach you!)

- Performing Quality Control on finished products (look for the little things!)- Full Time (40 Hours / Week)

- Competitive pay

- Flexible Hours if needed once trained

- 5 Days Paid Vacation (After 1 Year)
